name: user-agent-tools
short_description: Python library for generating random user agents and interpreting user agent strings.
long_description: User Agent Tools is a Python utility library that provides functionality for working with user agent strings. It allows developers to generate random, realistic user agent strings with optional filtering by browser and operating system, retrieve the most commonly used user agents, and parse user agent strings to extract detailed information about the client's browser, operating system, and platform. The library includes a dataset of user agents ranked by prevalence from real web traffic, making it useful for web scraping, API testing, automation, and understanding client browser environments.

modules.description: Core module implementing the UA class for generating and interpreting user agent strings with pattern matching for browsers and operating systems.
Package initialization exposing the UA class and defining package version (0.1.1) and metadata.
Dataset containing ranked list of user agent strings with their occurrence probabilities from real web traffic.
Unit tests covering user agent generation with filters, interpretation of different browser/OS combinations, and edge cases.
Package configuration and distribution metadata for PyPI publication.
Build script for code formatting, linting, testing, and cleanup using black and flake8.
